templates.name: Ollama (CPU)
templates.description: System service for running LLMs on CPU. Use this version for Mac machines. Manages shared model store for all AI applications.

templates.name: Ollama (NVIDIA GPU)
templates.description: System service for running LLMs with NVIDIA GPU acceleration. Manages shared model store.

templates.name: Ollama (AMD AI 370)
templates.description: System service for running LLMs with AMD AI 370-class ROCm support. Manages shared model store.

templates.name: Ollama (AMD Ryzen AI 395+)
templates.description: System service for running LLMs with AMD Ryzen AI 395+ ROCm support. Manages shared model store.

templates.name: Open WebUI
templates.description: User-friendly web interface for LLMs. Connects to existing Ollama instance.

templates.name: LibreChat
templates.description: Enhanced ChatGPT clone with multi-model support. Connects to Ollama and other AI providers.

templates.name: Uptime Kuma
templates.description: A fancy self-hosted monitoring tool for tracking the uptime and performance of your websites and applications.

templates.name: Nginx Test
templates.description: Simple Nginx web server for testing

templates.name: Readeck
templates.description: A simple web application to save and organize articles, web pages, and documents for later reading. Features full-text search and offline reading.

templates.name: Miniflux
templates.description: Minimalist and privacy-focused RSS feed reader. Features automatic tracking removal, full-text extraction, and keyboard navigation.

templates.name: Unifi Network Application
templates.description: Enterprise-grade network management system for Ubiquiti devices. Manages APs, switches, and gateways.

templates.name: Disk Speed Test
templates.description: Benchmark read and write speeds of storage volumes. Features both CLI and web UI for testing disk performance.

templates.name: Paperless NGX
templates.description: Smart document management system that transforms physical documents into a searchable digital archive with OCR and AI-powered organization.
